text: Death of a Salesman is a 1951 American drama movie directed by L치szl칩 Benedek. It is a based on the play of the same name by Arthur Miller. It stars Fredric March, Mildred Dunnock, Kevin McCarthy, Cameron Mitchell, Claire Carleton, Don Keefer and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 5 Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by L치szl칩 Benedek
